# SaveOptions.Default property

Gets a reference that contains default options for save, by default it creates the directory if it does not exist.

```csharp
public static SaveOptions Default { get; }
```

## Property Value

A [`SaveOptions`](../SaveOptions.md) that contains default options for save.
